issues.description: The problem statement’s UML specifies a method named emptyStock() for the Stock class (line 54 in problem_statement.md), but the template repository defines this method as clearInventory() (template_repository/src/de/tum/cit/ase/Stock.java lines 59–61). This naming mismatch will confuse students and cause tests expecting emptyStock() to fail.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the clearInventory() method in the Stock class within the template repository to emptyStock(), ensuring its signature and references match the problem statement and solution implementation.
